00061 // use round-nearest versions since it is the default
00062 #ifdef LIBM_EXP_ACCURATE
00063 dReal RaveExp(dReal f) {
00064     return exp(f);
00065 }
00066 #else
00067 dReal RaveExp(dReal f) {
00068     return exp_rn(f);
00069 }
00070 #endif
00071 #ifdef LIBM_LOG_ACCURATE
00072 dReal RaveLog(dReal f) {
00073     return log(f);
00074 }
00075 #else
00076 dReal RaveLog(dReal f) {
00077     return log_rn(f);
00078 }
00079 #endif
00080 #ifdef LIBM_COS_ACCURATE
00081 dReal RaveCos(dReal f) {
00082     return cos(f);
00083 }
00084 #else
00085 dReal RaveCos(dReal f) {
00086     return cos_rn(f);
00087 }
00088 #endif
00089 #ifdef LIBM_SIN_ACCURATE
00090 dReal RaveSin(dReal f) {
00091     return sin(f);
00092 }
00093 #else
00094 dReal RaveSin(dReal f) {
00095     return sin_rn(f);
00096 }
00097 #endif
00098 #ifdef LIBM_TAN_ACCURATE
00099 dReal RaveTan(dReal f) {
00100     return tan(f);
00101 }
00102 #else
00103 dReal RaveTan(dReal f) {
00104     return tan_rn(f);
00105 }
00106 #endif
00107 #ifdef LIBM_LOG2_ACCURATE
00108 dReal RaveLog2(dReal f) {
00109     return log2(f);
00110 }
00111 #else
00112 dReal RaveLog2(dReal f) {
00113     return log2_rn(f);
00114 }
00115 #endif
00116 #ifdef LIBM_LOG10_ACCURATE
00117 dReal RaveLog10(dReal f) {
00118     return log10(f);
00119 }
00120 #else
00121 dReal RaveLog10(dReal f) {
00122     return log10_rn(f);
00123 }
00124 #endif
00125 #ifdef LIBM_ACOS_ACCURATE
00126 dReal RaveAcos(dReal f) {
00127     return acos(f);
00128 }
00129 #else
00130 dReal RaveAcos(dReal f) {
00131     return acos_rn(f);
00132 }
00133 #endif
00134 #ifdef LIBM_ASIN_ACCURATE
00135 dReal RaveAsin(dReal f) {
00136     return asin(f);
00137 }
00138 #else
00139 dReal RaveAsin(dReal f) {
00140     return asin_rn(f);
00141 }
00142 #endif
00143 #ifdef LIBM_ATAN2_ACCURATE
00144 dReal RaveAtan2(dReal y, dReal x) {
00145     return atan2(y,x);
00146 }
00147 #else
00148 dReal RaveAtan2(dReal y, dReal x) // unfortunately no atan2 in crlibm...
00149 {
00150     dReal absx, absy, val;
00151     if ((x == 0)&&(y == 0)) {
00152         return 0;
00153     }
00154     absy = y < 0 ? -y : y;
00155     absx = x < 0 ? -x : x;
00156     if (absy - absx == absy) {
00157         // x negligible compared to y
00158         return y < 0 ? -M_PI_2 : M_PI_2;
00159     }
00160     if (absx - absy == absx) {
00161         // y negligible compared to x
00162         val = 0.0;
00163     }
00164     else val = atan_rn(y/x);
00165     if (x > 0) {
00166         // first or fourth quadrant; already correct
00167         return val;
00168     }
00169     if (y < 0) {
00170         // third quadrant
00171         return val - M_PI;
00172     }
00173     return val + M_PI;
00174 }
00175 #endif
00176 #ifdef LIBM_POW_ACCURATE
00177 dReal RavePow(dReal x, dReal y) {
00178     return pow(x,y);
00179 }
00180 #else
00181 dReal RavePow(dReal x, dReal y) {
00182     return pow_rn(x,y);
00183 }
00184 #endif
00185 #ifdef LIBM_SQRT_ACCURATE
00186 dReal RaveSqrt(dReal f) {
00187     return sqrt(f);
00188 }
00189 #else
00190 dReal RaveSqrt(dReal f) {
00191     return sqrt(f);
00192 }
00193 //dReal RaveSqrt(dReal f) { return pow_rn(f,0.5); } // NOTE: this is really slow, is it really worth the precision?
00194 #endif
00195 dReal RaveFabs(dReal f) {
00196     return fabs(f);
00197 }
00198 
00199 #else // use all standard libm
00200 
00201 #if OPENRAVE_PRECISION == 0 // floating-point
00202 dReal RaveExp(dReal f) {
00203     return expf(f);
00204 }
00205 dReal RaveLog(dReal f) {
00206     return logf(f);
00207 }
00208 dReal RaveCos(dReal f) {
00209     return cosf(f);
00210 }
00211 dReal RaveSin(dReal f) {
00212     return sinf(f);
00213 }
00214 dReal RaveTan(dReal f) {
00215     return tanf(f);
00216 }
00217 #ifdef HAS_LOG2
00218 dReal RaveLog2(dReal f) {
00219     return log2f(f);
00220 }
00221 #else
00222 dReal RaveLog2(dReal f) {
00223     return logf(f)/logf(2.0f);
00224 }
00225 #endif
00226 dReal RaveLog10(dReal f) {
00227     return log10f(f);
00228 }
00229 dReal RaveAcos(dReal f) {
00230     return acosf(f);
00231 }
00232 dReal RaveAsin(dReal f) {
00233     return asinf(f);
00234 }
00235 dReal RaveAtan2(dReal fy, dReal fx) {
00236     return atan2f(fy,fx);
00237 }
00238 dReal RavePow(dReal fx, dReal fy) {
00239     return powf(fx,fy);
00240 }
00241 dReal RaveSqrt(dReal f) {
00242     return sqrtf(f);
00243 }
00244 dReal RaveFabs(dReal f) {
00245     return fabsf(f);
00246 }
00247 #else
00248 dReal RaveExp(dReal f) {
00249     return exp(f);
00250 }
00251 dReal RaveLog(dReal f) {
00252     return log(f);
00253 }
00254 dReal RaveCos(dReal f) {
00255     return cos(f);
00256 }
00257 dReal RaveSin(dReal f) {
00258     return sin(f);
00259 }
00260 dReal RaveTan(dReal f) {
00261     return tan(f);
00262 }
00263 #ifdef HAS_LOG2
00264 dReal RaveLog2(dReal f) {
00265     return log2(f);
00266 }
00267 #else
00268 dReal RaveLog2(dReal f) {
00269     return log(f)/log(2.0f);
00270 }
00271 #endif
00272 dReal RaveLog10(dReal f) {
00273     return log10(f);
00274 }
00275 dReal RaveAcos(dReal f) {
00276     return acos(f);
00277 }
00278 dReal RaveAsin(dReal f) {
00279     return asin(f);
00280 }
00281 dReal RaveAtan2(dReal fy, dReal fx) {

00283 }

00297 static boost::once_flag _onceRaveInitialize = BOOST_ONCE_INIT;
00298 
00301 class RaveGlobal : private boost::noncopyable, public boost::enable_shared_from_this<RaveGlobal>, public UserData
00302 {
00303     typedef std::map<std::string, CreateXMLReaderFn, CaseInsensitiveCompare> READERSMAP;
00304 
00305     RaveGlobal()
00306     {
00307         // is this really necessary? just makes bugs hard to reproduce...
00308         //srand(GetMilliTime());
00309         //RaveInitRandomGeneration(GetMilliTime());
00310         _nDebugLevel = Level_Info;
00311         _nGlobalEnvironmentId = 0;
00312 
00313         _mapinterfacenames[PT_Planner] = "planner";
00314         _mapinterfacenames[PT_Robot] = "robot";
00315         _mapinterfacenames[PT_SensorSystem] = "sensorsystem";
00316         _mapinterfacenames[PT_Controller] = "controller";
00317         _mapinterfacenames[PT_Module] = "module";
00318         _mapinterfacenames[PT_IkSolver] = "iksolver";
00319         _mapinterfacenames[PT_KinBody] = "kinbody";
00320         _mapinterfacenames[PT_PhysicsEngine] = "physicsengine";
00321         _mapinterfacenames[PT_Sensor] = "sensor";
00322         _mapinterfacenames[PT_CollisionChecker] = "collisionchecker";
00323         _mapinterfacenames[PT_Trajectory] = "trajectory";
00324         _mapinterfacenames[PT_Viewer] = "viewer";
00325         _mapinterfacenames[PT_SpaceSampler] = "spacesampler";
00326         BOOST_ASSERT(_mapinterfacenames.size()==PT_NumberOfInterfaces);
00327 
00328         _mapikparameterization[IKP_Transform6D] = "Transform6d";
00329         _mapikparameterization[IKP_Rotation3D] = "Rotation3D";
00330         _mapikparameterization[IKP_Translation3D] = "Translation3D";
00331         _mapikparameterization[IKP_Direction3D] = "Direction3D";
00332         _mapikparameterization[IKP_Ray4D] = "Ray4D";
00333         _mapikparameterization[IKP_Lookat3D] = "Lookat3D";
00334         _mapikparameterization[IKP_TranslationDirection5D] = "TranslationDirection5D";
00335         _mapikparameterization[IKP_TranslationXY2D] = "TranslationXY2D";
00336         _mapikparameterization[IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D] = "TranslationXYOrientation3D";
00337         _mapikparameterization[IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D] = "TranslationLocalGlobal6D";
00338         BOOST_ASSERT(_mapikparameterization.size()==IKP_NumberOfParameterizations);
00339     }
00340 public:
00341     virtual ~RaveGlobal() {
00342         Destroy();
00343     }
00344 
00345     static boost::shared_ptr<RaveGlobal>& instance()
00346     {
00347         boost::call_once(_create,_onceRaveInitialize);
00348         return _state;
00349     }
00350 
00351     int Initialize(bool bLoadAllPlugins, int level)
00352     {
00353         if( _IsInitialized() ) {
00354             return 0;     // already initialized
00355         }
00356 
00357 #ifdef USE_CRLIBM
00358         _crlibm_fpu_state = crlibm_init();
00359 #endif
00360         try {
00361             // set to the classic locale so that number serialization/hashing works correctly
00362             std::locale::global(std::locale::classic());
00363         }
00364         catch(const std::runtime_error& e) {
00365             RAVELOG_WARN("failed to set to C locale: %s\n",e.what());
00366         }
00367 
00368         _nDebugLevel = level;
00369         _pdatabase.reset(new RaveDatabase());
00370         if( !_pdatabase->Init(bLoadAllPlugins) ) {
00371             RAVELOG_FATAL("failed to create the openrave plugin database\n");
00372         }
00373 
00374         char* phomedir = getenv("OPENRAVE_HOME");
00375         if( phomedir == NULL ) {
00376 #ifndef _WIN32
00377             _homedirectory = string(getenv("HOME"))+string("/.openrave");
00378 #else
00379             _homedirectory = string(getenv("HOMEDRIVE"))+string(getenv("HOMEPATH"))+string("\\.openrave");
00380 #endif
00381         }
00382         else {
00383             _homedirectory = phomedir;
00384         }
00385 #ifndef _WIN32
00386         mkdir(_homedirectory.c_str(),S_IRUSR | S_IWUSR | S_IRGRP | S_IROTH | S_IRWXU);
00387 #else
00388         CreateDirectory(_homedirectory.c_str(),NULL);
00389 #endif
00390 
00391         _vdbdirectories.clear();
00392         if( !RaveParseDirectories(getenv("OPENRAVE_DATABASE"), _vdbdirectories) ) {
00393             _vdbdirectories.push_back(_homedirectory);
00394         }
00395 
00396         return 0;
00397     }
00398 
00399     void Destroy()
00400     {
00401         // don't use any log statements since global instance might be null
00402         // environments have to be destroyed carefully since their destructors can be called, which will attempt to unregister the environment
00403         std::map<int, EnvironmentBase*> mapenvironments;
00404         {
00405             boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_mutexXML);
00406             mapenvironments = _mapenvironments;
00407         }
00408         FOREACH(itenv,mapenvironments) {
00409             // equire a shared pointer to prevent environment from getting deleted during Destroy loop
00410             EnvironmentBasePtr penv = itenv->second->shared_from_this();
00411             penv->Destroy();
00412         }
00413         mapenvironments.clear();
00414         _mapenvironments.clear();
00415         _pdefaultsampler.reset();
00416         _mapreaders.clear();
00417         _pdatabase.reset();
00418 #ifdef USE_CRLIBM
00419         crlibm_exit(_crlibm_fpu_state);
00420 #endif
00421     }
00422 
00423     std::string GetHomeDirectory()
00424     {
00425         return _homedirectory;
00426     }
00427 
00428     std::string FindDatabaseFile(const std::string& filename, bool bRead)
00429     {
00430         FOREACH(itdirectory,_vdbdirectories) {
00431 #ifdef HAVE_BOOST_FILESYSTEM
00432             std::string fullfilename = boost::filesystem::system_complete(boost::filesystem::path(*itdirectory)/filename).string();
00433 #else
00434             std::string fullfilename = *itdirectory;
00435             fullfilename += s_filesep;
00436             fullfilename += filename;
00437 #endif
00438             if( bRead ) {
00439                 if( !!ifstream(fullfilename.c_str()) ) {
00440                     return fullfilename;
00441                 }
00442             }
00443             else {
00444                 return fullfilename;
00445             }
00446         }
00447         return "";
00448     }
00449 
00450     void SetDebugLevel(int level)
00451     {
00452         _nDebugLevel = level;
00453     }
00454 
00455     int GetDebugLevel()
00456     {
00457         return _nDebugLevel;
00458     }
00459 
00460     class XMLReaderFunctionData : public UserData
00461     {
00462 public:
00463         XMLReaderFunctionData(InterfaceType type, const std::string& xmltag, const CreateXMLReaderFn& fn, boost::shared_ptr<RaveGlobal> global) : _global(global), _type(type), _xmltag(xmltag)
00464         {
00465             boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(global->_mutexXML);
00466             _oldfn = global->_mapreaders[_type][_xmltag];
00467             global->_mapreaders[_type][_xmltag] = fn;
00468         }
00469         virtual ~XMLReaderFunctionData()
00470         {
00471             boost::shared_ptr<RaveGlobal> global = _global.lock();
00472             if( !!global ) {
00473                 boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(global->_mutexXML);
00474                 global->_mapreaders[_type][_xmltag] = _oldfn;
00475             }
00476         }
00477 protected:
00478         CreateXMLReaderFn _oldfn;
00479         boost::weak_ptr<RaveGlobal> _global;
00480         InterfaceType _type;
00481         std::string _xmltag;
00482     };
00483 
00484     UserDataPtr RegisterXMLReader(InterfaceType type, const std::string& xmltag, const CreateXMLReaderFn& fn)
00485     {
00486         return UserDataPtr(new XMLReaderFunctionData(type,xmltag,fn,shared_from_this()));
00487     }
00488 
00489     const BaseXMLReaderPtr CallXMLReader(InterfaceType type, const std::string& xmltag, InterfaceBasePtr pinterface, const AttributesList& atts)
00490     {
00491         READERSMAP::iterator it = _mapreaders[type].find(xmltag);
00492         if( it == _mapreaders[type].end() ) {
00493             //throw openrave_exception(str(boost::format("No function registered for interface %s xml tag %s")%GetInterfaceName(type)%xmltag),ORE_InvalidArguments);
00494             return BaseXMLReaderPtr();
00495         }
00496         return it->second(pinterface,atts);
00497     }
00498 
00499     boost::shared_ptr<RaveDatabase> GetDatabase() const {
00500         return _pdatabase;
00501     }
00502     const std::map<InterfaceType,std::string>& GetInterfaceNamesMap() const {
00503         return _mapinterfacenames;
00504     }
00505     const std::map<IkParameterizationType,std::string>& GetIkParameterizationMap() {
00506         return _mapikparameterization;
00507     }
00508 
00509     const std::string& GetInterfaceName(InterfaceType type)
00510     {
00511         std::map<InterfaceType,std::string>::const_iterator it = _mapinterfacenames.find(type);
00512         if( it == _mapinterfacenames.end() ) {
00513             throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("Invalid type %d specified", type, ORE_Failed);
00514         }
00515         return it->second;
00516     }
00517 
00518     // have to take in pointer instead of shared_ptr since method will be called in EnvironmentBase constructor
00519     int RegisterEnvironment(EnvironmentBase* penv)
00520     {
00521         BOOST_ASSERT(!!_pdatabase);
00522         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_mutexXML);
00523         _mapenvironments[++_nGlobalEnvironmentId] = penv;
00524         return _nGlobalEnvironmentId;
00525     }
00526 
00527     void UnregisterEnvironment(EnvironmentBase* penv)
00528     {
00529         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_mutexXML);
00530         FOREACH(it, _mapenvironments) {
00531             if( it->second == penv ) {
00532                 _mapenvironments.erase(it);
00533                 break;
00534             }
00535         }
00536     }
00537 
00538     int GetEnvironmentId(EnvironmentBasePtr penv)
00539     {
00540         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_mutexXML);
00541         FOREACH(it,_mapenvironments) {
00542             if( it->second == penv.get() ) {
00543                 return it->first;
00544             }
00545         }
00546         return 0;
00547     }
00548 
00549     EnvironmentBasePtr GetEnvironment(int id)
00550     {
00551         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_mutexXML);
00552         std::map<int, EnvironmentBase*>::iterator it = _mapenvironments.find(id);
00553         if( it == _mapenvironments.end() ) {
00554             return EnvironmentBasePtr();
00555         }
00556         return it->second->shared_from_this();
00557     }
00558 
00559     void GetEnvironments(std::list<EnvironmentBasePtr>& listenvironments)
00560     {
00561         listenvironments.clear();
00562         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_mutexXML);
00563         FOREACH(it,_mapenvironments) {
00564             EnvironmentBasePtr penv = it->second->shared_from_this();
00565             if( !!penv ) {
00566                 listenvironments.push_back(penv);
00567             }
00568         }
00569     }
00570 
00571     SpaceSamplerBasePtr GetDefaultSampler()
00572     {
00573         if( !_pdefaultsampler ) {
00574             boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_mutexXML);
00575             BOOST_ASSERT( _mapenvironments.size() > 0 );
00576             _pdefaultsampler = GetDatabase()->CreateSpaceSampler(_mapenvironments.begin()->second->shared_from_this(),"MT19937");
00577         }
00578         return _pdefaultsampler;
00579     }
00580 
00581 protected:
00582     static void _create()
00583     {
00584         if( !_state ) {
00585             _state.reset(new RaveGlobal());
00586         }
00587     }
00588 
00589     bool _IsInitialized() const {
00590         return !!_pdatabase;
00591     }
00592 
00593 private:
00594     static boost::shared_ptr<RaveGlobal> _state;
00595     // state that is always present
00596 
00597     // state that is initialized/destroyed
00598     boost::shared_ptr<RaveDatabase> _pdatabase;
00599     int _nDebugLevel;
00600     boost::mutex _mutexXML;
00601     std::map<InterfaceType, READERSMAP > _mapreaders;
00602     std::map<InterfaceType,string> _mapinterfacenames;
00603     std::map<IkParameterizationType,string> _mapikparameterization;
00604     std::map<int, EnvironmentBase*> _mapenvironments;
00605     std::string _homedirectory;
00606     std::vector<std::string> _vdbdirectories;
00607     int _nGlobalEnvironmentId;
00608     SpaceSamplerBasePtr _pdefaultsampler;
00609 #ifdef USE_CRLIBM
00610     long long _crlibm_fpu_state;
00611 #endif
00612 
00613     friend void RaveInitializeFromState(UserDataPtr);
00614     friend UserDataPtr RaveGlobalState();
00615 };

00659 void RaveInitializeFromState(UserDataPtr globalstate)
00660 {
00661     RaveGlobal::_state = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<RaveGlobal>(globalstate);
00662 }
00663 
00664 UserDataPtr RaveGlobalState()
00665 {
00666     // only return valid pointer if initialized!
00667     boost::shared_ptr<RaveGlobal> state = RaveGlobal::_state;
00668     if( !!state && state->_IsInitialized() ) {
00669         return state;
00670     }
00671     return UserDataPtr();
00672 }
00673 
00674 void RaveDestroy()
00675 {
00676     RaveGlobal::instance()->Destroy();

00818 
00819 ConfigurationSpecification IkParameterization::GetConfigurationSpecification(IkParameterizationType iktype)
00820 {
00821     ConfigurationSpecification spec;
00822     spec._vgroups.resize(1);
00823     spec._vgroups[0].offset = 0;
00824     spec._vgroups[0].dof = IkParameterization::GetNumberOfValues(iktype);
00825     spec._vgroups[0].name = str(boost::format("ikparam_values %d")%iktype);
00826     spec._vgroups[0].interpolation = "linear";
00827     return spec;
00828 }
00829 
00830 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& O, const IkParameterization &ikparam)
00831 {
00832     O << ikparam._type << " ";
00833     switch(ikparam._type) {
00834     case IKP_Transform6D:
00835         O << ikparam.GetTransform6D();
00836         break;
00837     case IKP_Rotation3D:
00838         O << ikparam.GetRotation3D();
00839         break;
00840     case IKP_Translation3D: {
00841         Vector v = ikparam.GetTranslation3D();
00842         O << v.x << " " << v.y << " " << v.z << " ";
00843         break;
00844     }
00845     case IKP_Direction3D: {
00846         Vector v = ikparam.GetDirection3D();
00847         O << v.x << " " << v.y << " " << v.z << " ";
00848         break;
00849     }
00850     case IKP_Ray4D: {
00851         O << ikparam.GetRay4D();
00852         break;
00853     }
00854     case IKP_Lookat3D: {
00855         Vector v = ikparam.GetLookat3D();
00856         O << v.x << " " << v.y << " " << v.z << " ";
00857         break;
00858     }
00859     case IKP_TranslationDirection5D:
00860         O << ikparam.GetTranslationDirection5D();
00861         break;
00862     case IKP_TranslationXY2D: {
00863         Vector v = ikparam.GetTranslationXY2D();
00864         O << v.x << " " << v.y << " ";
00865         break;
00866     }
00867     case IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D: {
00868         Vector v = ikparam.GetTranslationXYOrientation3D();
00869         O << v.x << " " << v.y << " " << v.z << " ";
00870         break;
00871     }
00872     case IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D: {
00873         std::pair<Vector,Vector> p = ikparam.GetTranslationLocalGlobal6D();
00874         O << p.first.x << " " << p.first.y << " " << p.first.z << " " << p.second.x << " " << p.second.y << " " << p.second.z << " ";
00875         break;
00876     }
00877     default:
00878         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("does not support parameterization 0x%x", ikparam.GetType(),ORE_InvalidArguments);
00879     }
00880     return O;
00881 }
00882 
00883 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& I, IkParameterization& ikparam)
00884 {
00885     int type=IKP_None;
00886     I >> type;
00887     ikparam._type = static_cast<IkParameterizationType>(type);
00888     switch(ikparam._type) {
00889     case IKP_Transform6D: { Transform t; I >> t; ikparam.SetTransform6D(t); break; }
00890     case IKP_Rotation3D: { Vector v; I >> v; ikparam.SetRotation3D(v); break; }
00891     case IKP_Translation3D: { Vector v; I >> v.x >> v.y >> v.z; ikparam.SetTranslation3D(v); break; }
00892     case IKP_Direction3D: { Vector v; I >> v.x >> v.y >> v.z; ikparam.SetDirection3D(v); break; }
00893     case IKP_Ray4D: { RAY r; I >> r; ikparam.SetRay4D(r); break; }
00894     case IKP_Lookat3D: { Vector v; I >> v.x >> v.y >> v.z; ikparam.SetLookat3D(v); break; }
00895     case IKP_TranslationDirection5D: { RAY r; I >> r; ikparam.SetTranslationDirection5D(r); break; }
00896     case IKP_TranslationXY2D: { Vector v; I >> v.y >> v.y; ikparam.SetTranslationXY2D(v); break; }
00897     case IKP_TranslationXYOrientation3D: { Vector v; I >> v.y >> v.y >> v.z; ikparam.SetTranslationXYOrientation3D(v); break; }
00898     case IKP_TranslationLocalGlobal6D: { Vector localtrans, trans; I >> localtrans.x >> localtrans.y >> localtrans.z >> trans.x >> trans.y >> trans.z; ikparam.SetTranslationLocalGlobal6D(localtrans,trans); break; }
00899     default:
00900         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("does not support parameterization 0x%x", ikparam.GetType(),ORE_InvalidArguments);
00901     }
00902     return I;
00903 }
00904 
00905 int RaveGetIndexFromAffineDOF(int affinedofs, DOFAffine _dof)
00906 {
00907     int dof = static_cast<int>(_dof);
00908     dof &= affinedofs;
00909     int index = 0;
00910     if( dof&DOF_X ) {
00911         return index;
00912     }
00913     else if( affinedofs & DOF_X ) {
00914         ++index;
00915     }
00916     if( dof&DOF_Y ) {
00917         return index;
00918     }
00919     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Y ) {
00920         ++index;
00921     }
00922     if( dof&DOF_Z ) {
00923         return index;
00924     }
00925     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Z ) {
00926         ++index;
00927     }
00928     if( dof&DOF_RotationAxis ) {
00929         return index;
00930     }
00931     if( dof&DOF_Rotation3D ) {
00932         return index;
00933     }
00934     if( dof&DOF_RotationQuat ) {
00935         return index;
00936     }
00937     throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("unspecified dof 0x%x, 0x%x",affinedofs%dof,ORE_InvalidArguments);
00938 }
00939 
00940 DOFAffine RaveGetAffineDOFFromIndex(int affinedofs, int requestedindex)
00941 {
00942     BOOST_ASSERT(requestedindex >= 0);
00943     int index = 0;
00944     if( index == requestedindex && (affinedofs&DOF_X) ) {
00945         return DOF_X;
00946     }
00947     else if( affinedofs & DOF_X ) {
00948         ++index;
00949     }
00950     if( index == requestedindex && (affinedofs&DOF_Y) ) {
00951         return DOF_Y;
00952     }
00953     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Y ) {
00954         ++index;
00955     }
00956     if( index == requestedindex  && (affinedofs&DOF_Z)) {
00957         return DOF_Z;
00958     }
00959     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Z ) {
00960         ++index;
00961     }
00962     if( index <= requestedindex && index+3 > requestedindex && (affinedofs&DOF_RotationAxis) ) {
00963         return DOF_RotationAxis;
00964     }
00965     if( index <= requestedindex && index+3 > requestedindex && (affinedofs&DOF_Rotation3D) ) {
00966         return DOF_Rotation3D;
00967     }
00968     if( index <= requestedindex && index+4 > requestedindex && (affinedofs&DOF_RotationQuat) ) {
00969         return DOF_RotationQuat;
00970     }
00971     throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("requested index out of bounds %d (affinemask=0x%x)",requestedindex%affinedofs, ORE_InvalidArguments);
00972 }
00973 
00974 int RaveGetAffineDOF(int affinedofs)
00975 {
00976     if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationAxis ) {
00977         BOOST_ASSERT( !(affinedofs & (DOF_Rotation3D|DOF_RotationQuat)) );
00978     }
00979     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Rotation3D ) {
00980         BOOST_ASSERT( !(affinedofs & (DOF_RotationAxis|DOF_RotationQuat)) );
00981     }
00982     else if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationQuat ) {
00983         BOOST_ASSERT( !(affinedofs & (DOF_Rotation3D|DOF_RotationAxis)) );
00984     }
00985     int dof = 0;
00986     if( affinedofs & DOF_X ) {
00987         dof++;
00988     }
00989     if( affinedofs & DOF_Y ) {
00990         dof++;
00991     }
00992     if( affinedofs & DOF_Z ) {
00993         dof++;
00994     }
00995     if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationAxis ) {
00996         dof++;
00997     }
00998     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Rotation3D ) {
00999         dof += 3;
01000     }
01001     else if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationQuat ) {
01002         dof += 4;
01003     }
01004     return dof;
01005 }
01006 
01007 void RaveGetAffineDOFValuesFromTransform(std::vector<dReal>::iterator itvalues, const Transform& t, int affinedofs, const Vector& vActvAffineRotationAxis)
01008 {
01009     if( affinedofs & DOF_X ) {
01010         *itvalues++ = t.trans.x;
01011     }
01012     if( affinedofs & DOF_Y ) {
01013         *itvalues++ = t.trans.y;
01014     }
01015     if( affinedofs & DOF_Z ) {
01016         *itvalues++ = t.trans.z;
01017     }
01018     if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationAxis ) {
01019         // assume that rot.yzw ~= vActvAffineRotationAxis
01020         dReal fsin = RaveSqrt(t.rot.y * t.rot.y + t.rot.z * t.rot.z + t.rot.w * t.rot.w);
01021 
01022         // figure out correct sign
01023         if( (t.rot.y > 0) != (vActvAffineRotationAxis.x>0) || (t.rot.z > 0) != (vActvAffineRotationAxis.y>0) || (t.rot.w > 0) != (vActvAffineRotationAxis.z>0) ) {
01024             fsin = -fsin;
01025         }
01026         *itvalues++ = 2 * RaveAtan2(fsin, t.rot.x);
01027     }
01028     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Rotation3D ) {
01029         dReal fsin = RaveSqrt(t.rot.y * t.rot.y + t.rot.z * t.rot.z + t.rot.w * t.rot.w);
01030         dReal fangle = 2 * atan2(fsin, t.rot.x);
01031         if( fsin > 0 ) {
01032             dReal normalizer = fangle / fsin;
01033             *itvalues++ = normalizer * t.rot.y;
01034             *itvalues++ = normalizer * t.rot.z;
01035             *itvalues++ = normalizer * t.rot.w;
01036         }
01037         else {
01038             *itvalues++ = 0;
01039             *itvalues++ = 0;
01040             *itvalues++ = 0;
01041         }
01042     }
01043     else if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationQuat ) {
01044         *itvalues++ = t.rot.x;
01045         *itvalues++ = t.rot.y;
01046         *itvalues++ = t.rot.z;
01047         *itvalues++ = t.rot.w;
01048     }
01049 }
01050 
01051 void RaveGetTransformFromAffineDOFValues(Transform& t, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itvalues, int affinedofs, const Vector& vActvAffineRotationAxis)
01052 {
01053     if( affinedofs & DOF_X ) {
01054         t.trans.x = *itvalues++;
01055     }
01056     if( affinedofs & DOF_Y ) {
01057         t.trans.y = *itvalues++;
01058     }
01059     if( affinedofs & DOF_Z ) {
01060         t.trans.z = *itvalues++;
01061     }
01062     if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationAxis ) {
01063         dReal angle = *itvalues++;
01064         dReal fsin = RaveSin(angle*(dReal)0.5);
01065         t.rot.x = RaveCos(angle*(dReal)0.5);
01066         t.rot.y = vActvAffineRotationAxis.x * fsin;
01067         t.rot.z = vActvAffineRotationAxis.y * fsin;
01068         t.rot.w = vActvAffineRotationAxis.z * fsin;
01069     }
01070     else if( affinedofs & DOF_Rotation3D ) {
01071         dReal x = *itvalues++;
01072         dReal y = *itvalues++;
01073         dReal z = *itvalues++;
01074         dReal fang = RaveSqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z);
01075         if( fang > 0 ) {
01076             dReal fnormalizer = sin((dReal)0.5 * fang) / fang;
01077             t.rot.x = cos((dReal)0.5 * fang);
01078             t.rot.y = fnormalizer * x;
01079             t.rot.z = fnormalizer * y;
01080             t.rot.w = fnormalizer * z;
01081         }
01082         else {
01083             t.rot = Vector(1,0,0,0); // identity
01084         }
01085     }
01086     else if( affinedofs & DOF_RotationQuat ) {
01087         // have to normalize since user might not be aware of this particular parameterization of rotations
01088         t.rot.x = *itvalues++;
01089         t.rot.y = *itvalues++;
01090         t.rot.z = *itvalues++;
01091         t.rot.w = *itvalues++;
01092         t.rot.normalize4();
01093     }
01094 }
01095 
01096 ConfigurationSpecification RaveGetAffineConfigurationSpecification(int affinedofs,KinBodyConstPtr pbody)
01097 {
01098     ConfigurationSpecification spec;
01099     spec._vgroups.resize(1);
01100     spec._vgroups[0].offset = 0;
01101     spec._vgroups[0].dof = RaveGetAffineDOF(affinedofs);
01102     spec._vgroups[0].interpolation = "linear";
01103     if( !!pbody ) {
01104         spec._vgroups[0].name = str(boost::format("affine_transform %s %d")%pbody->GetName()%affinedofs);
01105     }
01106     else {
01107         spec._vgroups[0].name = str(boost::format("affine_transform __dummy__ %d")%affinedofs);
01108     }
01109     return spec;
01110 }
01111 
01112 int ConfigurationSpecification::GetDOF() const
01113 {
01114     int maxdof = 0;
01115     FOREACHC(it,_vgroups) {
01116         maxdof = max(maxdof,it->offset+it->dof);
01117     }
01118     return maxdof;
01119 }
01120 
01121 bool ConfigurationSpecification::IsValid() const
01122 {
01123     vector<uint8_t> occupied(GetDOF(),0);
01124     FOREACHC(it,_vgroups) {
01125         if(it->offset < 0 || it->dof <= 0 || it->offset+it->dof > (int)occupied.size()) {
01126             return false;
01127         }
01128         for(int i = it->offset; i < it->offset+it->dof; ++i) {
01129             if( occupied[i] ) {
01130                 return false;
01131             }
01132             occupied[i] = 1;
01133         }
01134     }
01135     FOREACH(it,occupied) {
01136         if( *it == 0 ) {
01137             return false;
01138         }
01139     }
01140     // check for repeating names
01141     FOREACHC(it,_vgroups) {
01142         for(std::vector<Group>::const_iterator it2 = it+1; it2 != _vgroups.end(); ++it2) {
01143             if( it->name == it2->name ) {
01144                 return false;
01145             }
01146         }
01147     }
01148     return true;
01149 }
01150 
01151 bool ConfigurationSpecification::operator==(const ConfigurationSpecification& r) const
01152 {
01153     if( _vgroups.size() != r._vgroups.size() ) {
01154         return false;
01155     }
01156     // the groups could be out of order
01157     for(size_t i = 0; i < _vgroups.size(); ++i) {
01158         size_t j;
01159         for(j=0; j < r._vgroups.size(); ++j) {
01160             if( _vgroups[i].offset == r._vgroups[j].offset ) {
01161                 if( _vgroups[i] != r._vgroups[j] ) {
01162                     return false;
01163                 }
01164                 break;
01165             }
01166         }
01167         if( j >= r._vgroups.size() ) {
01168             return false;
01169         }
01170     }
01171     return true;
01172 }
01173 
01174 bool ConfigurationSpecification::operator!=(const ConfigurationSpecification& r) const
01175 {
01176     return !this->operator==(r);
01177 }
01178 
01179 std::vector<ConfigurationSpecification::Group>::const_iterator ConfigurationSpecification::FindCompatibleGroup(const ConfigurationSpecification::Group& g, bool exactmatch) const
01180 {
01181     std::vector<ConfigurationSpecification::Group>::const_iterator itsemanticmatch = _vgroups.end();
01182     uint32_t bestmatchscore = 0;
01183     stringstream ss(g.name);
01184     std::vector<std::string> tokens((istream_iterator<std::string>(ss)), istream_iterator<std::string>());
01185     if( tokens.size() == 0 ) {
01186         return _vgroups.end();
01187     }
01188     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01189         if( itgroup->name == g.name && itgroup->dof == g.dof) {
01190             return itgroup;
01191         }
01192         if( exactmatch ) {
01193             continue;
01194         }
01195         ss.clear();
01196         ss.str(itgroup->name);
01197         std::vector<std::string> curtokens((istream_iterator<std::string>(ss)), istream_iterator<std::string>());
01198         if( curtokens.size() == 0 ) {
01199             continue;
01200         }
01201         if( curtokens.at(0) == tokens.at(0) ) {
01202             uint32_t matchscore=1;
01203             if( curtokens.size() > 1 && tokens.size() > 1 ) {
01204                 if( curtokens.at(1) == tokens.at(1) ) {
01205                     matchscore += 0x80000000;
01206                 }
01207                 if( curtokens.size() > 2 && tokens.size() > 2 ) {
01208                     for(size_t i = 2; i < tokens.size(); ++i) {
01209                         if( find(curtokens.begin()+2,curtokens.end(),tokens[i]) != curtokens.end() ) {
01210                             matchscore += 1;
01211                         }
01212                     }
01213                 }
01214             }
01215             if( bestmatchscore < matchscore ) {
01216                 itsemanticmatch = itgroup;
01217             }
01218         }
01219     }
01220     return itsemanticmatch;
01221 }
01222 
01223 std::vector<ConfigurationSpecification::Group>::const_iterator ConfigurationSpecification::FindTimeDerivativeGroup(const ConfigurationSpecification::Group& g, bool exactmatch) const
01224 {
01225     ConfigurationSpecification::Group gderivative;
01226     if( g.name.size() >= 12 && g.name.substr(0,12) == "joint_values" ) {
01227         gderivative.name = string("joint_velocities") + g.name.substr(12);
01228     }
01229     else if( g.name.size() >= 16 && g.name.substr(0,16) == "joint_velocities" ) {
01230         gderivative.name = string("joint_accelerations") + g.name.substr(16);
01231     }
01232     else if( g.name.size() >= 16 && g.name.substr(0,16) == "affine_transform" ) {
01233         gderivative.name = string("affine_velocities") + g.name.substr(16);
01234     }
01235     else if( g.name.size() >= 17 && g.name.substr(0,17) == "affine_velocities" ) {
01236         gderivative.name = string("affine_accelerations") + g.name.substr(17);
01237     }
01238     else if( g.name.size() >= 14 && g.name.substr(0,14) == "ikparam_values" ) {
01239         gderivative.name = string("ikparam_velocities") + g.name.substr(14);
01240     }
01241     else {
01242         return _vgroups.end();
01243     }
01244     gderivative.dof = g.dof;
01245     return FindCompatibleGroup(gderivative,exactmatch);
01246 }
01247 
01248 void ConfigurationSpecification::AddVelocityGroups(bool adddeltatime)
01249 {
01250     if( _vgroups.size() == 0 ) {
01251         return;
01252     }
01253     std::list<std::vector<ConfigurationSpecification::Group>::iterator> listtoremove;
01254     std::list<ConfigurationSpecification::Group> listadd;
01255     int offset = GetDOF();
01256     bool hasdeltatime = false;
01257     FOREACH(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01258         string replacename;
01259         int offset = -1;
01260         if( itgroup->name.size() >= 12 && itgroup->name.substr(0,12) == "joint_values" ) {
01261             replacename = "joint_velocities";
01262             offset = 12;
01263         }
01264         else if( itgroup->name.size() >= 16 && itgroup->name.substr(0,16) == "affine_transform" ) {
01265             replacename = "affine_velocities";
01266             offset = 16;
01267         }
01268         else if( itgroup->name.size() >= 14 && itgroup->name.substr(0,14) == "ikparam_values" ) {
01269             replacename = "ikparam_velocities";
01270             offset = 14;
01271         }
01272 
01273         if( offset > 0 ) {
01274             ConfigurationSpecification::Group g;
01275             g.name = replacename + itgroup->name.substr(offset);
01276             g.dof = itgroup->dof;
01277             std::vector<ConfigurationSpecification::Group>::const_iterator itcompat = FindCompatibleGroup(g);
01278             if( itcompat != _vgroups.end() ) {
01279                 if( itcompat->dof == g.dof ) {
01280                     ConfigurationSpecification::Group& gmodify = _vgroups.at(itcompat-_vgroups.begin());
01281                     gmodify.name = g.name;
01282                 }
01283                 else {
01284                     listtoremove.push_back(_vgroups.begin()+(itcompat-_vgroups.begin()));
01285                     listadd.push_back(g);
01286                 }
01287             }
01288             else {
01289                 listadd.push_back(g);
01290             }
01291         }
01292         else {
01293             if( !hasdeltatime ) {
01294                 hasdeltatime = itgroup->name.size() >= 9 && itgroup->name.substr(0,9) == "deltatime";
01295             }
01296         }
01297     }
01298     if( listtoremove.size() > 0 ) {
01299         FOREACH(it,listtoremove) {
01300             _vgroups.erase(*it);
01301         }
01302         ResetGroupOffsets();
01303         offset = GetDOF();
01304     }
01305     FOREACH(itadd, listadd) {
01306         itadd->offset = offset;
01307         offset += itadd->dof;
01308         _vgroups.push_back(*itadd);
01309     }
01310     if( !hasdeltatime && adddeltatime ) {
01311         AddDeltaTime();
01312     }
01313 }
01314 
01315 ConfigurationSpecification ConfigurationSpecification::ConvertToVelocitySpecification() const
01316 {
01317     ConfigurationSpecification vspec;
01318     vspec._vgroups = _vgroups;
01319     FOREACH(itgroup,vspec._vgroups) {
01320         if( itgroup->name.size() >= 12 && itgroup->name.substr(0,12) == "joint_values" ) {
01321             itgroup->name = string("joint_velocities") + itgroup->name.substr(12);
01322         }
01323         else if( itgroup->name.size() >= 16 && itgroup->name.substr(0,16) == "affine_transform" ) {
01324             itgroup->name = string("affine_velocities") + itgroup->name.substr(16);
01325         }
01326         else if( itgroup->name.size() >= 14 && itgroup->name.substr(0,14) == "ikparam_values" ) {
01327             itgroup->name = string("ikparam_velocities") + itgroup->name.substr(14);
01328         }
01329     }
01330     return vspec;
01331 }
01332 
01333 ConfigurationSpecification ConfigurationSpecification::GetTimeDerivativeSpecification(int timederivative) const
01334 {
01335     ConfigurationSpecification vspec;
01336     vspec._vgroups = _vgroups;
01337     const boost::array<string,3> posgroups = {{"joint_values","affine_transform","ikparam_values"}};
01338     const boost::array<string,3> velgroups = {{"joint_velocities","affine_velocities","ikparam_velocities"}};
01339     const boost::array<string,3> accgroups = {{"joint_accelerations","affine_accelerations","ikparam_accelerations"}};
01340     const boost::array<string,3>* pgroup=NULL;
01341     if( timederivative == 0 ) {
01342         pgroup = &posgroups;
01343     }
01344     else if( timederivative == 1 ) {
01345         pgroup = &velgroups;
01346     }
01347     else if( timederivative == 2 ) {
01348         pgroup = &accgroups;
01349     }
01350     else {
01351         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("invalid timederivative",ORE_InvalidArguments);
01352     }
01353 
01354     FOREACH(itgroup,vspec._vgroups) {
01355         for(size_t i = 0; i < pgroup->size(); ++i) {
01356             const string& name = pgroup->at(i);
01357             if( itgroup->name.size() >= name.size() && itgroup->name.substr(0,name.size()) == name ) {
01358                 vspec._vgroups.push_back(*itgroup);
01359                 break;
01360             }
01361         }
01362     }
01363     vspec.ResetGroupOffsets();
01364     return vspec;
01365 }
01366 
01367 void ConfigurationSpecification::ResetGroupOffsets()
01368 {
01369     int offset = 0;
01370     FOREACH(it,_vgroups) {
01371         it->offset = offset;
01372         offset += it->dof;
01373     }
01374 }
01375 
01376 int ConfigurationSpecification::AddDeltaTime()
01377 {
01378     int dof = 0;
01379     for(size_t i = 0; i < _vgroups.size(); ++i) {
01380         dof = max(dof,_vgroups[i].offset+_vgroups[i].dof);
01381         if( _vgroups[i].name == "deltatime" ) {
01382             return _vgroups[i].offset;
01383         }
01384     }
01385     ConfigurationSpecification::Group g;
01386     g.name = "deltatime";
01387     g.offset = dof;
01388     g.dof = 1;
01389     _vgroups.push_back(g);
01390     return g.offset;
01391 }
01392 
01393 bool ConfigurationSpecification::ExtractTransform(Transform& t, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itdata, KinBodyConstPtr pbody) const
01394 {
01395     bool bfound = false;
01396     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01397         if( itgroup->name.size() >= 16 && itgroup->name.substr(0,16) == "affine_transform" ) {
01398             stringstream ss(itgroup->name.substr(16));
01399             string bodyname;
01400             int affinedofs=0;
01401             ss >> bodyname >> affinedofs;
01402             if( !!ss ) {
01403                 if( !!pbody && bodyname != pbody->GetName() ) {
01404                     continue;
01405                 }
01406                 RaveGetTransformFromAffineDOFValues(t,itdata+itgroup->offset,affinedofs);
01407                 bfound = true;
01408             }
01409         }
01410     }
01411     return bfound;
01412 }
01413 
01414 bool ConfigurationSpecification::ExtractIkParameterization(IkParameterization& ikparam, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itdata, int timederivative) const
01415 {
01416     bool bfound = false;
01417     string searchname;
01418     switch( timederivative ) {
01419     case 0: searchname = "ikparam_values"; break;
01420     case 1: searchname = "ikparam_velocities"; break;
01421     default:
01422         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("bad time derivative",ORE_InvalidArguments);
01423     };
01424     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01425         if( itgroup->name.size() >= searchname.size() && itgroup->name.substr(0,searchname.size()) == searchname ) {
01426             stringstream ss(itgroup->name.substr(searchname.size()));
01427             int iktype = IKP_None;
01428             ss >> iktype;
01429             if( !!ss ) {
01430                 ikparam.Set(itdata+itgroup->offset,static_cast<IkParameterizationType>(iktype));
01431                 bfound = true;
01432             }
01433         }
01434     }
01435     return bfound;
01436 }
01437 
01438 bool ConfigurationSpecification::ExtractAffineValues(std::vector<dReal>::iterator itvalues, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itdata, KinBodyConstPtr pbody, int affinedofs, int timederivative) const
01439 {
01440     if( affinedofs == 0 ) {
01441         return false;
01442     }
01443     string searchname;
01444     switch( timederivative ) {
01445     case 0: searchname = "affine_values"; break;
01446     case 1: searchname = "affine_velocities"; break;
01447     case 2: searchname = "affine_accelerations"; break;
01448     default:
01449         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("bad time derivative",ORE_InvalidArguments);
01450     };
01451     bool bfound = false;
01452     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01453         if( itgroup->name.size() >= searchname.size() && itgroup->name.substr(0,searchname.size()) == searchname ) {
01454             stringstream ss(itgroup->name.substr(searchname.size()));
01455             string bodyname;
01456             int sourceaffinedofs=0;
01457             ss >> bodyname >> sourceaffinedofs;
01458             if( !!ss ) {
01459                 if( !!pbody && bodyname != pbody->GetName() ) {
01460                     continue;
01461                 }
01462 
01463                 for(int index = 0; index < RaveGetAffineDOF(affinedofs); ++index) {
01464                     DOFAffine dof = RaveGetAffineDOFFromIndex(affinedofs,index);
01465                     int startindex = RaveGetIndexFromAffineDOF(affinedofs,dof);
01466                     if( sourceaffinedofs & dof ) {
01467                         int sourceindex = RaveGetIndexFromAffineDOF(sourceaffinedofs,dof);
01468                         *(itvalues+index) = *(itdata + sourceindex + (index-startindex));
01469                     }
01470                 }
01471                 bfound = true;
01472             }
01473         }
01474     }
01475     return bfound;
01476 }
01477 
01478 bool ConfigurationSpecification::ExtractJointValues(std::vector<dReal>::iterator itvalues, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itdata, KinBodyConstPtr pbody, const std::vector<int>& indices, int timederivative) const
01479 {
01480     if( indices.size() == 0 ) {
01481         return false;
01482     }
01483     string searchname;
01484     switch( timederivative ) {
01485     case 0: searchname = "joint_values"; break;
01486     case 1: searchname = "joint_velocities"; break;
01487     case 2: searchname = "joint_accelerations"; break;
01488     default:
01489         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("bad time derivative",ORE_InvalidArguments);
01490     };
01491     bool bfound = false;
01492     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01493         if( itgroup->name.size() >= searchname.size() && itgroup->name.substr(0,searchname.size()) == searchname ) {
01494             stringstream ss(itgroup->name.substr(searchname.size()));
01495             string bodyname;
01496             ss >> bodyname;
01497             if( !!ss ) {
01498                 if( !!pbody && bodyname != pbody->GetName() ) {
01499                     continue;
01500                 }
01501                 vector<int> vgroupindices((istream_iterator<int>(ss)), istream_iterator<int>());
01502                 for(size_t i = 0; i < indices.size(); ++i) {
01503                     std::vector<int>::iterator it = find(vgroupindices.begin(),vgroupindices.end(),indices[i]);
01504                     if( it != vgroupindices.end() ) {
01505                         *(itvalues+i) = *(itdata+itgroup->offset+(it-vgroupindices.begin()));
01506                     }
01507                 }
01508                 bfound = true;
01509             }
01510         }
01511     }
01512     return bfound;
01513 }
01514 
01515 bool ConfigurationSpecification::ExtractDeltaTime(dReal& deltatime, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itdata) const
01516 {
01517     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01518         if( itgroup->name == "deltatime" ) {
01519             deltatime = *(itdata+itgroup->offset);
01520             return true;
01521         }
01522     }
01523     return false;
01524 }
01525 
01526 bool ConfigurationSpecification::InsertJointValues(std::vector<dReal>::iterator itdata, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itvalues, KinBodyConstPtr pbody, const std::vector<int>& indices, int timederivative) const
01527 {
01528     if( indices.size() == 0 ) {
01529         return false;
01530     }
01531     string searchname;
01532     switch( timederivative ) {
01533     case 0: searchname = "joint_values"; break;
01534     case 1: searchname = "joint_velocities"; break;
01535     case 2: searchname = "joint_accelerations"; break;
01536     default:
01537         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("bad time derivative",ORE_InvalidArguments);
01538     };
01539     bool bfound = false;
01540     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01541         if( itgroup->name.size() >= searchname.size() && itgroup->name.substr(0,searchname.size()) == searchname ) {
01542             stringstream ss(itgroup->name.substr(searchname.size()));
01543             string bodyname;
01544             ss >> bodyname;
01545             if( !!ss ) {
01546                 if( !!pbody && bodyname != pbody->GetName() ) {
01547                     continue;
01548                 }
01549                 vector<int> vgroupindices((istream_iterator<int>(ss)), istream_iterator<int>());
01550                 for(size_t i = 0; i < vgroupindices.size(); ++i) {
01551                     std::vector<int>::const_iterator it = find(indices.begin(),indices.end(),vgroupindices[i]);
01552                     if( it != indices.end() ) {
01553                         *(itdata+itgroup->offset+i) = *(itvalues+*it);
01554                     }
01555                 }
01556                 bfound = true;
01557             }
01558         }
01559     }
01560     return bfound;
01561 }
01562 
01563 bool ConfigurationSpecification::InsertDeltaTime(std::vector<dReal>::iterator itdata, dReal deltatime)
01564 {
01565     bool bfound = false;
01566     FOREACHC(itgroup,_vgroups) {
01567         if( itgroup->name == "deltatime" ) {
01568             *(itdata+itgroup->offset) = deltatime;
01569             bfound = true;
01570         }
01571     }
01572     return bfound;
01573 }
01574 
01575 static void ConvertDOFRotation_AxisFrom3D(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittarget, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsource, const Vector& vaxis)
01576 {
01577     Vector axisangle(*(itsource+0),*(itsource+1),*(itsource+2));
01578     *ittarget = normalizeAxisRotation(vaxis,quatFromAxisAngle(axisangle)).first;
01579 }
01580 
01581 static void ConvertDOFRotation_AxisFromQuat(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittarget, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsource, const Vector& vaxis)
01582 {
01583     Vector quat(*(itsource+0),*(itsource+1),*(itsource+2),*(itsource+3));
01584     *ittarget = normalizeAxisRotation(vaxis,quat).first;
01585 }
01586 
01587 static void ConvertDOFRotation_3DFromAxis(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittarget, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsource, const Vector& vaxis)
01588 {
01589     *(ittarget+0) = vaxis[0]* *itsource;
01590     *(ittarget+1) = vaxis[1]* *itsource;
01591     *(ittarget+2) = vaxis[2]* *itsource;
01592 }
01593 static void ConvertDOFRotation_3DFromQuat(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittarget, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsource)
01594 {
01595     Vector quat(*(itsource+0),*(itsource+1),*(itsource+2),*(itsource+3));
01596     Vector axisangle = quatFromAxisAngle(quat);
01597     *(ittarget+0) = axisangle[0];
01598     *(ittarget+1) = axisangle[1];
01599     *(ittarget+2) = axisangle[2];
01600 }
01601 static void ConvertDOFRotation_QuatFromAxis(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittarget, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsource, const Vector& vaxis)
01602 {
01603     Vector axisangle = vaxis * *itsource;
01604     Vector quat = quatFromAxisAngle(axisangle);
01605     *(ittarget+0) = quat[0];
01606     *(ittarget+1) = quat[1];
01607     *(ittarget+2) = quat[2];
01608     *(ittarget+3) = quat[3];
01609 }
01610 
01611 static void ConvertDOFRotation_QuatFrom3D(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittarget, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsource)
01612 {
01613     Vector axisangle(*(itsource+0),*(itsource+1),*(itsource+2));
01614     Vector quat = quatFromAxisAngle(axisangle);
01615     *(ittarget+0) = quat[0];
01616     *(ittarget+1) = quat[1];
01617     *(ittarget+2) = quat[2];
01618     *(ittarget+3) = quat[3];
01619 }
01620 
01621 void ConfigurationSpecification::ConvertGroupData(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittargetdata, size_t targetstride, const ConfigurationSpecification::Group& gtarget, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsourcedata, size_t sourcestride, const ConfigurationSpecification::Group& gsource, size_t numpoints, EnvironmentBaseConstPtr penv)
01622 {
01623     if( numpoints > 1 ) {
01624         BOOST_ASSERT(targetstride != 0 && sourcestride != 0 );
01625     }
01626     if( gsource.name == gtarget.name ) {
01627         BOOST_ASSERT(gsource.dof==gtarget.dof);
01628         for(size_t i = 0; i < numpoints; ++i, itsourcedata += sourcestride, ittargetdata += targetstride) {
01629             std::copy(itsourcedata,itsourcedata+gsource.dof,ittargetdata);
01630         }
01631     }
01632     else {
01633         stringstream ss(gtarget.name);
01634         std::vector<std::string> targettokens((istream_iterator<std::string>(ss)), istream_iterator<std::string>());
01635         ss.clear();
01636         ss.str(gsource.name);
01637         std::vector<std::string> sourcetokens((istream_iterator<std::string>(ss)), istream_iterator<std::string>());
01638 
01639         BOOST_ASSERT(targettokens.at(0) == sourcetokens.at(0));
01640         vector<int> vtransferindices; vtransferindices.reserve(gtarget.dof);
01641         std::vector<dReal> vdefaultvalues;
01642         if( targettokens.at(0).size() >= 6 && targettokens.at(0).substr(0,6) == "joint_") {
01643             std::vector<int> vsourceindices(gsource.dof), vtargetindices(gtarget.dof);
01644             if( (int)sourcetokens.size() < gsource.dof+2 ) {
01645                 RAVELOG_DEBUG(str(boost::format("source tokens '%s' do not have %d dof indices, guessing....")%gsource.name%gsource.dof));
01646                 for(int i = 0; i < gsource.dof; ++i) {
01647                     vsourceindices[i] = i;
01648                 }
01649             }
01650             else {
01651                 for(int i = 0; i < gsource.dof; ++i) {
01652                     vsourceindices[i] = boost::lexical_cast<int>(sourcetokens.at(i+2));
01653                 }
01654             }
01655             if( (int)targettokens.size() < gtarget.dof+2 ) {
01656                 RAVELOG_WARN(str(boost::format("target tokens '%s' do not match dof '%d', guessing....")%gtarget.name%gtarget.dof));
01657                 for(int i = 0; i < gtarget.dof; ++i) {
01658                     vtargetindices[i] = i;
01659                 }
01660             }
01661             else {
01662                 for(int i = 0; i < gtarget.dof; ++i) {
01663                     vtargetindices[i] = boost::lexical_cast<int>(targettokens.at(i+2));
01664                 }
01665             }
01666 
01667             bool bUninitializedData=false;
01668             FOREACH(ittargetindex,vtargetindices) {
01669                 std::vector<int>::iterator it = find(vsourceindices.begin(),vsourceindices.end(),*ittargetindex);
01670                 if( it == vsourceindices.end() ) {
01671                     bUninitializedData = true;
01672                     vtransferindices.push_back(-1);
01673                 }
01674                 else {
01675                     vtransferindices.push_back(static_cast<int>(it-vsourceindices.begin()));
01676                 }
01677             }
01678 
01679             if( bUninitializedData ) {
01680                 KinBodyPtr pbody;
01681                 if( targettokens.size() > 1 ) {
01682                     pbody = penv->GetKinBody(targettokens.at(1));
01683                 }
01684                 if( !pbody && sourcetokens.size() > 1 ) {
01685                     pbody = penv->GetKinBody(sourcetokens.at(1));
01686                 }
01687                 if( !pbody ) {
01688                     RAVELOG_WARN(str(boost::format("could not find body '%s' or '%s'")%gtarget.name%gsource.name));
01689                     vdefaultvalues.resize(vtargetindices.size(),0);
01690                 }
01691                 else {
01692                     std::vector<dReal> vbodyvalues;
01693                     vdefaultvalues.resize(vtargetindices.size(),0);
01694                     if( targettokens[0] == "joint_values" ) {
01695                         pbody->GetDOFValues(vbodyvalues);
01696                     }
01697                     else if( targettokens[0] == "joint_velocities" ) {
01698                         pbody->GetDOFVelocities(vbodyvalues);
01699                     }
01700                     if( vbodyvalues.size() > 0 ) {
01701                         for(size_t i = 0; i < vdefaultvalues.size(); ++i) {
01702                             vdefaultvalues[i] = vbodyvalues.at(vtargetindices[i]);
01703                         }
01704                     }
01705                 }
01706             }
01707         }
01708         else if( targettokens.at(0).size() >= 7 && targettokens.at(0).substr(0,7) == "affine_") {
01709             int affinesource = 0, affinetarget = 0;
01710             Vector sourceaxis(0,0,1), targetaxis(0,0,1);
01711             if( sourcetokens.size() < 3 ) {
01712                 if( targettokens.size() < 3 && gsource.dof == gtarget.dof ) {
01713                     for(size_t i = 0; i < targettokens.size(); ++i) {
01714                         vtransferindices[i] = i;
01715                     }
01716                 }
01717                 else {
01718                     throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("source affine information not present '%s'\n",gsource.name,ORE_InvalidArguments);
01719                 }
01720             }
01721             else {
01722                 affinesource = boost::lexical_cast<int>(sourcetokens.at(2));
01723                 BOOST_ASSERT(RaveGetAffineDOF(affinesource) == gsource.dof);
01724                 if( (affinesource & DOF_RotationAxis) && sourcetokens.size() >= 6 ) {
01725                     sourceaxis.x = boost::lexical_cast<dReal>(sourcetokens.at(3));
01726                     sourceaxis.y = boost::lexical_cast<dReal>(sourcetokens.at(4));
01727                     sourceaxis.z = boost::lexical_cast<dReal>(sourcetokens.at(5));
01728                 }
01729             }
01730             if( vtransferindices.size() == 0 ) {
01731                 if( targettokens.size() < 3 ) {
01732                     throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("target affine information not present '%s'\n",gtarget.name,ORE_InvalidArguments);
01733                 }
01734                 else {
01735                     affinetarget = boost::lexical_cast<int>(targettokens.at(2));
01736                     BOOST_ASSERT(RaveGetAffineDOF(affinetarget) == gtarget.dof);
01737                     if( (affinetarget & DOF_RotationAxis) && targettokens.size() >= 6 ) {
01738                         targetaxis.x = boost::lexical_cast<dReal>(targettokens.at(3));
01739                         targetaxis.y = boost::lexical_cast<dReal>(targettokens.at(4));
01740                         targetaxis.z = boost::lexical_cast<dReal>(targettokens.at(5));
01741                     }
01742                 }
01743 
01744                 int commondata = affinesource&affinetarget;
01745                 int uninitdata = affinetarget&(~commondata);
01746                 int sourcerotationstart = -1, targetrotationstart = -1, targetrotationend = -1;
01747                 boost::function< void(std::vector<dReal>::iterator, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator) > rotconverterfn;
01748                 if( (uninitdata & DOF_RotationMask) && (affinetarget & DOF_RotationMask) && (affinesource & DOF_RotationMask) ) {
01749                     // both hold rotations, but need to convert
01750                     uninitdata &= ~DOF_RotationMask;
01751                     sourcerotationstart = RaveGetIndexFromAffineDOF(affinesource,DOF_RotationMask);
01752                     targetrotationstart = RaveGetIndexFromAffineDOF(affinetarget,DOF_RotationMask);
01753                     targetrotationend = targetrotationstart+RaveGetAffineDOF(affinetarget&DOF_RotationMask);
01754                     if( affinetarget & DOF_RotationAxis ) {
01755                         if( affinesource & DOF_Rotation3D ) {
01756                             rotconverterfn = boost::bind(ConvertDOFRotation_AxisFrom3D,_1,_2,targetaxis);
01757                         }
01758                         else if( affinesource & DOF_RotationQuat ) {
01759                             rotconverterfn = boost::bind(ConvertDOFRotation_AxisFromQuat,_1,_2,targetaxis);
01760                         }
01761                     }
01762                     else if( affinetarget & DOF_Rotation3D ) {
01763                         if( affinesource & DOF_RotationAxis ) {
01764                             rotconverterfn = boost::bind(ConvertDOFRotation_3DFromAxis,_1,_2,sourceaxis);
01765                         }
01766                         else if( affinesource & DOF_RotationQuat ) {
01767                             rotconverterfn = ConvertDOFRotation_3DFromQuat;
01768                         }
01769                     }
01770                     else if( affinetarget & DOF_RotationQuat ) {
01771                         if( affinesource & DOF_RotationAxis ) {
01772                             rotconverterfn = boost::bind(ConvertDOFRotation_QuatFromAxis,_1,_2,sourceaxis);
01773                         }
01774                         else if( affinesource & DOF_Rotation3D ) {
01775                             rotconverterfn = ConvertDOFRotation_QuatFrom3D;
01776                         }
01777                     }
01778                     BOOST_ASSERT(!!rotconverterfn);
01779                 }
01780                 if( uninitdata ) {
01781                     // initialize with the current body values
01782                     KinBodyPtr pbody;
01783                     if( targettokens.size() > 1 ) {
01784                         pbody = penv->GetKinBody(targettokens.at(1));
01785                     }
01786                     if( !pbody && sourcetokens.size() > 1 ) {
01787                         pbody = penv->GetKinBody(sourcetokens.at(1));
01788                     }
01789                     if( !pbody ) {
01790                         RAVELOG_WARN(str(boost::format("could not find body '%s' or '%s'")%gtarget.name%gsource.name));
01791                         vdefaultvalues.resize(gtarget.dof,0);
01792                     }
01793                     else {
01794                         vdefaultvalues.resize(gtarget.dof);
01795                         RaveGetAffineDOFValuesFromTransform(vdefaultvalues.begin(),pbody->GetTransform(),affinetarget);
01796                     }
01797                 }
01798 
01799                 for(int index = 0; index < gtarget.dof; ++index) {
01800                     DOFAffine dof = RaveGetAffineDOFFromIndex(affinetarget,index);
01801                     int startindex = RaveGetIndexFromAffineDOF(affinetarget,dof);
01802                     if( affinesource & dof ) {
01803                         int sourceindex = RaveGetIndexFromAffineDOF(affinesource,dof);
01804                         vtransferindices.push_back(sourceindex + (index-startindex));
01805                     }
01806                     else {
01807                         vtransferindices.push_back(-1);
01808                     }
01809                 }
01810 
01811                 for(size_t i = 0; i < numpoints; ++i, itsourcedata += sourcestride, ittargetdata += targetstride) {
01812                     for(int j = 0; j < (int)vtransferindices.size(); ++j) {
01813                         if( vtransferindices[j] >= 0 ) {
01814                             *(ittargetdata+j) = *(itsourcedata+vtransferindices[j]);
01815                         }
01816                         else {
01817                             if( j >= targetrotationstart && j < targetrotationend ) {
01818                                 if( j == targetrotationstart ) {
01819                                     // only convert when at first index
01820                                     rotconverterfn(ittargetdata+targetrotationstart,itsourcedata+sourcerotationstart);
01821                                 }
01822                             }
01823                             else {
01824                                 *(ittargetdata+j) = vdefaultvalues.at(j);
01825                             }
01826                         }
01827                     }
01828                 }
01829                 return;
01830             }
01831         }
01832         else if( targettokens.at(0).size() >= 8 && targettokens.at(0).substr(0,8) == "ikparam_") {
01833             IkParameterizationType iktypesource, iktypetarget;
01834             if( sourcetokens.size() >= 2 ) {
01835                 iktypesource = static_cast<IkParameterizationType>(boost::lexical_cast<int>(sourcetokens[1]));
01836             }
01837             else {
01838                 throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("ikparam type not present '%s'\n",gsource.name,ORE_InvalidArguments);
01839             }
01840             if( targettokens.size() >= 2 ) {
01841                 iktypetarget = static_cast<IkParameterizationType>(boost::lexical_cast<int>(targettokens[1]));
01842             }
01843             else {
01844                 throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("ikparam type not present '%s'\n",gtarget.name,ORE_InvalidArguments);
01845             }
01846 
01847             if( iktypetarget == iktypesource ) {
01848                 vtransferindices.resize(IkParameterization::GetDOF(iktypetarget));
01849                 for(size_t i = 0; i < vtransferindices.size(); ++i) {
01850                     vtransferindices[i] = i;
01851                 }
01852             }
01853             else {
01854                 RAVELOG_WARN("ikparam types do not match");
01855             }
01856         }
01857         else {
01858             throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("unsupported token conversion: %s",gtarget.name,ORE_InvalidArguments);
01859         }
01860 
01861         for(size_t i = 0; i < numpoints; ++i, itsourcedata += sourcestride, ittargetdata += targetstride) {
01862             for(size_t j = 0; j < vtransferindices.size(); ++j) {
01863                 if( vtransferindices[j] >= 0 ) {
01864                     *(ittargetdata+j) = *(itsourcedata+vtransferindices[j]);
01865                 }
01866                 else {
01867                     *(ittargetdata+j) = vdefaultvalues.at(j);
01868                 }
01869             }
01870         }
01871     }
01872 }
01873 
01874 void ConfigurationSpecification::ConvertData(std::vector<dReal>::iterator ittargetdata, const ConfigurationSpecification &targetspec, std::vector<dReal>::const_iterator itsourcedata, const ConfigurationSpecification &sourcespec, size_t numpoints, EnvironmentBaseConstPtr penv, bool filluninitialized)
01875 {
01876     for(size_t igroup = 0; igroup < targetspec._vgroups.size(); ++igroup) {
01877         std::vector<ConfigurationSpecification::Group>::const_iterator itcompatgroup = sourcespec.FindCompatibleGroup(targetspec._vgroups[igroup]);
01878         if( itcompatgroup != sourcespec._vgroups.end() ) {
01879             ConfigurationSpecification::ConvertGroupData(ittargetdata+targetspec._vgroups[igroup].offset, targetspec.GetDOF(), targetspec._vgroups[igroup], itsourcedata+itcompatgroup->offset, sourcespec.GetDOF(), *itcompatgroup,numpoints,penv);
01880         }
01881         else if( filluninitialized ) {
01882             vector<dReal> vdefaultvalues(targetspec._vgroups[igroup].dof,0);
01883             const string& name = targetspec._vgroups[igroup].name;
01884             if( name.size() >= 12 && name.substr(0,12) == "joint_values" ) {
01885                 string bodyname;
01886                 stringstream ss(name.substr(12));
01887                 ss >> bodyname;
01888                 if( !!ss ) {
01889                     if( !!penv ) {
01890                         KinBodyPtr body = penv->GetKinBody(bodyname);
01891                         if( !!body ) {
01892                             vector<dReal> values;
01893                             body->GetDOFValues(values);
01894                             std::vector<int> indices((istream_iterator<int>(ss)), istream_iterator<int>());
01895                             for(size_t i = 0; i < indices.size(); ++i) {
01896                                 vdefaultvalues.at(i) = values.at(indices[i]);
01897                             }
01898                         }
01899                     }
01900                 }
01901             }
01902             else if( name.size() >= 16 && name.substr(0,16) == "affine_transform" ) {
01903                 string bodyname;
01904                 int affinedofs;
01905                 stringstream ss(name.substr(16));
01906                 ss >> bodyname >> affinedofs;
01907                 if( !!ss ) {
01908                     Transform tdefault;
01909                     if( !!penv ) {
01910                         KinBodyPtr body = penv->GetKinBody(bodyname);
01911                         if( !!body ) {
01912                             tdefault = body->GetTransform();
01913                         }
01914                     }
01915                     BOOST_ASSERT((int)vdefaultvalues.size() == RaveGetAffineDOF(affinedofs));
01916                     RaveGetAffineDOFValuesFromTransform(vdefaultvalues.begin(),tdefault,affinedofs);
01917                 }
01918             }
01919             else if( name != "deltatime" ) {
01920                 RAVELOG_VERBOSE(str(boost::format("cannot initialize unknown group '%s'")%name));
01921             }
01922             int offset = targetspec._vgroups[igroup].offset;
01923             for(size_t i = 0; i < numpoints; ++i, offset += targetspec.GetDOF()) {
01924                 for(size_t j = 0; j < vdefaultvalues.size(); ++j) {
01925                     *(ittargetdata+offset+j) = vdefaultvalues[j];
01926                 }
01927             }
01928         }
01929     }
01930 }
01931 
01932 ConfigurationSpecification::Reader::Reader(ConfigurationSpecification& spec) : _spec(spec)
01933 {
01934     _spec = ConfigurationSpecification(); // reset
01935 }
01936 
01937 BaseXMLReader::ProcessElement ConfigurationSpecification::Reader::startElement(const std::string& name, const AttributesList &atts)
01938 {
01939     _ss.str(""); // have to clear the string
01940     if( name == "group" ) {
01941         _spec._vgroups.resize(_spec._vgroups.size()+1);
01942         ConfigurationSpecification::Group& g = _spec._vgroups.back();
01943         FOREACHC(itatt,atts) {
01944             if( itatt->first == "name" ) {
01945                 g.name = itatt->second;
01946             }
01947             else if( itatt->first == "interpolation" ) {
01948                 g.interpolation = itatt->second;
01949             }
01950             else if( itatt->first == "offset" ) {
01951                 g.offset = boost::lexical_cast<int>(itatt->second);
01952             }
01953             else if( itatt->first == "dof" ) {
01954                 g.dof = boost::lexical_cast<int>(itatt->second);
01955             }
01956         }
01957         return PE_Support;
01958     }
01959     return PE_Pass;
01960 }
01961 
01962 bool ConfigurationSpecification::Reader::endElement(const std::string& name)
01963 {
01964     if( name == "configuration" ) {
01965         return true;
01966     }
01967     return false;
01968 }
01969 
01970 void ConfigurationSpecification::Reader::characters(const std::string& ch)
01971 {
01972     _ss.clear();
01973     _ss << ch;
01974 }
01975 
01976 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& O, const ConfigurationSpecification &spec)
01977 {
01978     O << "<configuration>" << endl;
01979     FOREACHC(it,spec._vgroups) {
01980         O << "<group name=\"" << it->name << "\" offset=\"" << it->offset << "\" dof=\"" << it->dof << "\" interpolation=\"" << it->interpolation << "\"/>" << endl;
01981     }
01982     O << "</configuration>" << endl;
01983     return O;
01984 }
01985 
01986 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& I, ConfigurationSpecification& spec)
01987 {
01988     if( !!I) {
01989         stringbuf buf;
01990         stringstream::streampos pos = I.tellg();
01991         I.get(buf, 0); // get all the data, yes this is inefficient, not sure if there anyway to search in streams
01992 
01993         string pbuf = buf.str();
01994         const char* p = strcasestr(pbuf.c_str(), "</configuration>");
01995         int ppsize=-1;
01996         if( p != NULL ) {
01997             I.clear();
01998             ppsize=(p-pbuf.c_str())+20;
01999             I.seekg((size_t)pos+ppsize);
02000         }
02001         else {
02002             throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("error, failed to find </configuration> in %s",buf.str(),ORE_InvalidArguments);
02003         }
02004         ConfigurationSpecification::Reader reader(spec);
02005         LocalXML::ParseXMLData(BaseXMLReaderPtr(&reader,null_deleter()), pbuf.c_str(), ppsize);
02006         BOOST_ASSERT(spec.IsValid());
02007     }
02008 
02009     return I;
02010 }

02012 void CollisionReport::Reset(int coloptions)
02013 {
02014     options = coloptions;
02015     minDistance = 1e20f;
02016     numCols = 0;
02017     numWithinTol = 0;
02018     contacts.resize(0);
02019     vLinkColliding.resize(0);
02020 }
02021 
02022 std::string CollisionReport::__str__() const
02023 {
02024     stringstream s;
02025     s << "(";
02026     if( !!plink1 ) {
02027         s << plink1->GetParent()->GetName() << ":" << plink1->GetName();
02028     }
02029     s << ")x(";
02030     if( !!plink2 ) {
02031         s << plink2->GetParent()->GetName() << ":" << plink2->GetName();
02032     }
02033     s << ") contacts="<<contacts.size();
02034     return s.str();
02035 }
02036 
02037 // Dummy Reader
02038 DummyXMLReader::DummyXMLReader(const std::string& fieldname, const std::string& pparentname, boost::shared_ptr<std::ostream> osrecord) : _fieldname(fieldname), _osrecord(osrecord)
02039 {
02040     _parentname = pparentname;
02041     _parentname += ":";
02042     _parentname += _fieldname;
02043 }
02044 
02045 BaseXMLReader::ProcessElement DummyXMLReader::startElement(const std::string& name, const AttributesList &atts)
02046 {
02047     if( !!_pcurreader ) {
02048         if( _pcurreader->startElement(name, atts) == PE_Support )
02049             return PE_Support;
02050         return PE_Ignore;
02051     }
02052 
02053     if( !!_osrecord ) {
02054         *_osrecord << "<" << name << " ";
02055         FOREACHC(itatt, atts)
02056         *_osrecord << itatt->first << "=\"" << itatt->second << "\" ";
02057         *_osrecord << ">" << endl;
02058     }
02059 
02060     // create a new parser
02061     _pcurreader.reset(new DummyXMLReader(name, _parentname,_osrecord));
02062     return PE_Support;
02063 }
02064 
02065 bool DummyXMLReader::endElement(const std::string& name)
02066 {
02067     if( !!_pcurreader ) {
02068         if( _pcurreader->endElement(name) ) {
02069             _pcurreader.reset();
02070             if( !!_osrecord )
02071                 *_osrecord << "</" << name << ">" << endl;
02072         }
02073         return false;
02074     }
02075 
02076     if( name == _fieldname )
02077         return true;
02078     RAVELOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("invalid xml tag %s\n")%name));
02079     return false;
02080 }
02081 
02082 void DummyXMLReader::characters(const std::string& ch)
02083 {
02084     if( !_pcurreader ) {
02085         if( !!_osrecord )
02086             *_osrecord << ch;
02087     }
02088     else {
02089         _pcurreader->characters(ch);
02090     }
02091 }

02100 }

02105 }

02173 
02174 std::string GetMD5HashString(const std::string& s)
02175 {
02176     if( s.size() == 0 )
02177         return "";
02178 
02179     md5_state_t state;
02180     md5_byte_t digest[16];
02181 
02182     md5_init(&state);
02183     md5_append(&state, (const md5_byte_t *)s.c_str(), s.size());
02184     md5_finish(&state, digest);
02185     string hex_output;
02186     hex_output.resize(32);
02187     for (int di = 0; di < 16; ++di) {
02188         int n = (digest[di]&0xf);
02189         hex_output[2*di+1] = n > 9 ? ('a'+n-10) : ('0'+n);
02190         n = (digest[di]&0xf0)>>4;
02191         hex_output[2*di+0] = n > 9 ? ('a'+n-10) : ('0'+n);
02192     }
02193     return hex_output;
02194 }
02195 
02196 std::string GetMD5HashString(const std::vector<uint8_t>&v)
02197 {
02198     if( v.size() == 0 )
02199         return "";
02200 
02201     md5_state_t state;
02202     md5_byte_t digest[16];
02203 
02204     md5_init(&state);
02205     md5_append(&state, (const md5_byte_t *)&v[0], v.size());
02206     md5_finish(&state, digest);
02207     string hex_output;
02208     hex_output.resize(32);
02209     for (int di = 0; di < 16; ++di) {
02210         int n = (digest[di]&0xf);
02211         hex_output[2*di+0] = n > 9 ? ('a'+n-10) : ('0'+n);
02212         n = (digest[di]&0xf0)>>4;
02213         hex_output[2*di+1] = n > 9 ? ('a'+n-10) : ('0'+n);
02214     }
02215     return hex_output;
02216 }
02217 
02218 bool PairStringLengthCompare(const std::pair<std::string, std::string>&p0, const std::pair<std::string, std::string>&p1)
02219 {
02220     return p0.first.size() > p1.first.size();
02221 }
02222 
02223 std::string& SearchAndReplace(std::string& out, const std::string& in, const std::vector< std::pair<std::string, std::string> >&_pairs)
02224 {
02225     BOOST_ASSERT(&out != &in);
02226     FOREACHC(itp,_pairs) {
02227         BOOST_ASSERT(itp->first.size()>0);
02228     }
02229     std::vector< std::pair<std::string, std::string> > pairs = _pairs;
02230     stable_sort(pairs.begin(),pairs.end(),PairStringLengthCompare);
02231     out.resize(0);
02232     size_t startindex = 0;
02233     while(startindex < in.size()) {
02234         size_t nextindex=std::string::npos;
02235         std::vector< std::pair<std::string, std::string> >::const_iterator itbestp;
02236         FOREACHC(itp,pairs) {
02237             size_t index = in.find(itp->first,startindex);
02238             if((nextindex == std::string::npos)|| ((index != std::string::npos)&&(index < nextindex)) ) {
02239                 nextindex = index;
02240                 itbestp = itp;
02241             }
02242         }
02243         if( nextindex == std::string::npos ) {
02244             out += in.substr(startindex);
02245             break;
02246         }
02247         out += in.substr(startindex,nextindex-startindex);
02248         out += itbestp->second;
02249         startindex = nextindex+itbestp->first.size();
02250     }
02251     return out;
02252 }
