02254 namespace LocalXML {
02255 
02256 void RaveXMLErrorFunc(void *ctx, const char *msg, ...)
02257 {
02258     va_list args;
02259 
02260     va_start(args, msg);
02261     RAVELOG_ERROR("XML Parse error: ");
02262     vprintf(msg,args);
02263     va_end(args);
02264 }
02265 
02266 struct XMLREADERDATA
02267 {
02268     XMLREADERDATA(BaseXMLReaderPtr preader, xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt) : _preader(preader), _ctxt(ctxt) {
02269     }
02270     BaseXMLReaderPtr _preader, _pdummy;
02271     xmlParserCtxtPtr _ctxt;
02272 };
02273 
02274 void DefaultStartElementSAXFunc(void *ctx, const xmlChar *name, const xmlChar **atts)
02275 {
02276     AttributesList listatts;
02277     if( atts != NULL ) {
02278         for (int i = 0; (atts[i] != NULL); i+=2) {
02279             listatts.push_back(make_pair(string((const char*)atts[i]),string((const char*)atts[i+1])));
02280             std::transform(listatts.back().first.begin(), listatts.back().first.end(), listatts.back().first.begin(), ::tolower);
02281         }
02282     }
02283 
02284     XMLREADERDATA* pdata = (XMLREADERDATA*)ctx;
02285     string s = (const char*)name;
02286     std::transform(s.begin(), s.end(), s.begin(), ::tolower);
02287     if( !!pdata->_pdummy ) {
02288         RAVELOG_VERBOSE(str(boost::format("unknown field %s\n")%s));
02289         pdata->_pdummy->startElement(s,listatts);
02290     }
02291     else {
02292         if( ((XMLREADERDATA*)ctx)->_preader->startElement(s, listatts) != BaseXMLReader::PE_Support ) {
02293             // not handling, so create a temporary class to handle it
02294             pdata->_pdummy.reset(new DummyXMLReader(s,"(libxml)"));
02295         }
02296     }
02297 }
02298 
02299 void DefaultEndElementSAXFunc(void *ctx, const xmlChar *name)
02300 {
02301     XMLREADERDATA* pdata = (XMLREADERDATA*)ctx;
02302     string s = (const char*)name;
02303     std::transform(s.begin(), s.end(), s.begin(), ::tolower);
02304     if( !!pdata->_pdummy ) {
02305         if( pdata->_pdummy->endElement(s) ) {
02306             pdata->_pdummy.reset();
02307         }
02308     }
02309     else {
02310         if( pdata->_preader->endElement(s) ) {
02311             //RAVEPRINT(L"%s size read %d\n", name, data->_ctxt->input->consumed);
02312             xmlStopParser(pdata->_ctxt);
02313         }
02314     }
02315 }
02316 
02317 void DefaultCharactersSAXFunc(void *ctx, const xmlChar *ch, int len)
02318 {
02319     XMLREADERDATA* pdata = (XMLREADERDATA*)ctx;
02320     if( !!pdata->_pdummy ) {
02321         pdata->_pdummy->characters(string((const char*)ch, len));
02322     }
02323     else {
02324         pdata->_preader->characters(string((const char*)ch, len));
02325     }
02326 }
02327 
02328 bool xmlDetectSAX2(xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt)
02329 {
02330     if (ctxt == NULL) {
02331         return false;
02332     }
02333 #ifdef LIBXML_SAX1_ENABLED
02334     if ((ctxt->sax) &&  (ctxt->sax->initialized == XML_SAX2_MAGIC) && ((ctxt->sax->startElementNs != NULL) || (ctxt->sax->endElementNs != NULL))) {
02335         ctxt->sax2 = 1;
02336     }
02337 #else
02338     ctxt->sax2 = 1;
02339 #endif
02340 
02341     ctxt->str_xml = xmlDictLookup(ctxt->dict, BAD_CAST "xml", 3);
02342     ctxt->str_xmlns = xmlDictLookup(ctxt->dict, BAD_CAST "xmlns", 5);
02343     ctxt->str_xml_ns = xmlDictLookup(ctxt->dict, XML_XML_NAMESPACE, 36);
02344     if ((ctxt->str_xml==NULL) || (ctxt->str_xmlns==NULL) || (ctxt->str_xml_ns == NULL)) {
02345         return false;
02346     }
02347     return true;
02348 }
02349 
02350 bool ParseXMLData(BaseXMLReaderPtr preader, const char* buffer, int size)
02351 {
02352     static xmlSAXHandler s_DefaultSAXHandler = { 0};
02353     if( size <= 0 ) {
02354         size = strlen(buffer);
02355     }
02356     if( !s_DefaultSAXHandler.initialized ) {
02357         // first time, so init
02358         s_DefaultSAXHandler.startElement = DefaultStartElementSAXFunc;
02359         s_DefaultSAXHandler.endElement = DefaultEndElementSAXFunc;
02360         s_DefaultSAXHandler.characters = DefaultCharactersSAXFunc;
02361         s_DefaultSAXHandler.error = RaveXMLErrorFunc;
02362         s_DefaultSAXHandler.initialized = 1;
02363     }
02364 
02365     xmlSAXHandlerPtr sax = &s_DefaultSAXHandler;
02366     int ret = 0;
02367     xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt;
02368 
02369     ctxt = xmlCreateMemoryParserCtxt(buffer, size);
02370     if (ctxt == NULL) {
02371         return false;
02372     }
02373     if (ctxt->sax != (xmlSAXHandlerPtr) &xmlDefaultSAXHandler) {
02374         xmlFree(ctxt->sax);
02375     }
02376     ctxt->sax = sax;
02377     xmlDetectSAX2(ctxt);
02378 
02379     XMLREADERDATA reader(preader, ctxt);
02380     ctxt->userData = &reader;
02381 
02382     xmlParseDocument(ctxt);
02383 
02384     if (ctxt->wellFormed) {
02385         ret = 0;
02386     }
02387     else {
02388         if (ctxt->errNo != 0) {
02389             ret = ctxt->errNo;
02390         }
02391         else {
02392             ret = -1;
02393         }
02394     }
02395     if (sax != NULL) {
02396         ctxt->sax = NULL;
02397     }
02398     if (ctxt->myDoc != NULL) {
02399         xmlFreeDoc(ctxt->myDoc);
02400         ctxt->myDoc = NULL;
02401     }
02402     xmlFreeParserCtxt(ctxt);
02403 
02404     return ret==0;
02405 }
02406 
02407 }
02408 
02409 } // end namespace OpenRAVE
